messages.title: WHAT THIS ELECTION IS ABOUT:
messages.content: Strong and stable leadership in the national interest with Theresa May and John Glen or weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn.

messages.title: WORKING HARD FOR THE PEOPLE OF SALISBURY AND SOUTH WILTSHIRE
messages.content: John Glen grew up in Wiltshire and has been Salisbury's MP for seven years - he works hard to secure jobs, investment for schools, and improving local public services. A vote for John Glen is a vote for a committed, local representative who will be accountable to you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Deliver on Brexit with a comprehensive free trade agreement and immigration reforms that continue to welcome those who work hard.
Prioritise our national security by investing 0.5% more every year in the defence budget.
Invest £8 billion above inflation in our NHS, increase pensions and ensure social care is affordable for all - including a cap on costs.
Boost the schools budget by an extra £4 billion and introduce a fairer funding formula where no Salisbury school sees its budget cut as a result.

mentions.candidate: Every vote cast for John Glen is a vote for a hardworking local representative and a national government that will make the right long-term decisions for our national security and prosperity. A dedicated and hardworking MP who will give leadership on economic development in Salisbury to provide opportunities for the next generation.

issues.brexitEurope: A mainstream Brexit that ensures stability for business and a reformed immigration system.
issues.economy: The deficit has been cut by three quarters and we are the fastest growing economy in the G7.
issues.education: Invest £4 billion more for our schools and fairer funding with no Salisbury school seeing its budget cut as a result.
issues.health: Increasing NHS spending by £8 billion above inflation.
issues.immigration: Deliver on Brexit with comprehensive free trade agreement and immigration reforms that continue to welcome those who work hard.
issues.socialWelfare: Increase pensions and ensure social care is affordable for all - including a cap on costs.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have proven that I can be a strong voice, able to influence decisions in Westminster, for all the people of Salisbury. Every vote for me at this election is a vote for a hardworking local MP who will focus on the issues that matter to you.

politicalExperience.achievements: Works hard to secure jobs, investment for schools, and improving local public services.

quotes.text: John Glen delivers on Brexit, boosts school budgets, funds NHS, and improves immigration while providing strong leadership.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet focuses on the candidate's alignment with national leadership and policies, highlighting a commitment to strong government and stability, as well as local investment and public service improvements.
